Name: 1. TLC DAY
checklistText: LUNAR MODULE ACTIVATION 1. TLC DAY - IVT TO LM - ENTRY STATUS CHECK - COMM ACTIVATION (COMM CHECKS) - S-BAND/VHF SIMPLEX VOICE TEST (COMM CHECKS) - COMM DEACTIVATION (COMM CHECKS) - IVT TO CSM Glossary: IVT: Intra-vehicular Transfer Moving between the CM and the LM LM: Lunar Module CSM: Command/Service Module
